fund: Text name or identifier of the investment fund to which the cash-flow figures relate.
year: Date (usually set to 1-Jan) indicating the financial or fiscal year for which the cash flows are recorded.
cash_out_flow: Total amount of cash that left the fund during the stated year (e.g., capital deployments, expenses), recorded as a numeric value and typically negative.
cash_in_flow: Total amount of cash received by the fund during the stated year (e.g., capital calls from investors, proceeds from investments), recorded as a numeric value.
net_cash_flow: Net cash movement for the year, calculated as cash_in_flow minus cash_out_flow, showing the fund’s overall cash generation or usage for that period.
